name: UpdateDnsRecord
description:
Update an existing DNS record for a domain.

This tool updates an existing DNS record for a specified domain name. It should be called when changes to a DNS record are needed, such as modifying the value or type. The tool returns details of the updated record after the operation is successful.

parameters.name: dns_record_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the DNS record to be updated.

value_schema.description: The id of the DNS record

parameters.name: dns_record_update_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the DNS record to update, including name, value, type, TTL, and optional parameters like MX priority or SRV details.

name.description: The name of the DNS record

value.description: The value of the DNS record

type.description: The type of the DNS record

ttl.description: The Time to live (TTL) value of the DNS record

mxPriority.description: The MX priority value of the DNS record

comment.description: A comment to add context on what this DNS record is for

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team performing the request.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the Team to perform the DNS update on behalf of. It is used to specify the team context for the request.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: The id of the DNS record

value_schema.description: The id of the DNS record

name.description: The name of the DNS record

value.description: The value of the DNS record

type.description: The type of the DNS record

ttl.description: The Time to live (TTL) value of the DNS record

mxPriority.description: The MX priority value of the DNS record

comment.description: A comment to add context on what this DNS record is for
